content.rendered:
Directed by Kim In-ha

Written by Insoon Lee. Eunji Lee. Lee Soo-min. Park Yi-Lee. Noh Kyung-won. Kim Hwa-won . Park Jeong-eun

Language Korean

Producers Park Sang-hyuk

Production Lee Min-ha . Heo Jeong-in . Seo Jee-seon. Eunsun Lee. Kim Young-bae.

Season 1

Total Episodes 10
